attributes.action: Build a new indoor/sheltered skate-park for Wolverhampton
attributes.background: The main skate-park for Wolverhampton is small, over crowded and un-sheltered making it near impossible for everybody to be able to skate when we want. The government complains they want us off the streets so give us all somewhere to go.

rejection.details:
You could raise this issue with your local council. You can find out how to petition your council here:

http://www.wolverhampton.gov.uk/article/2915/Petitions
